Posts.EditableText:
This appears to be the standard  picture frame, as far as I can tell. Does it appear different for you?

To  enable it, the option is "Picture frame: a static picture that appears above text. Pictures can be set per room, or using a script command" at the bottom of the game's "Interface" tab.
Posts.HTML:
This appears to be the standard picture frame, as far as I can tell. Does it appear different for you?

To enable it, the option is "Picture frame: a static picture that appears above text. Pictures can be set per room, or using a script command" at the bottom of the game's "Interface" tab.
